Cottage Pie

Source: cookidoo.thermomix.com

Directions

Place garlic, onion, carrots, celery, tomatoes, red pepper, oregano and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop 3 sec/speed 5, then cook 30 min/212°F//speed .

Add ground beef, tomato paste and salt, gently stir through with spatula and cook 20 min/212°F//speed 1. Transfer into an oval baking dish (approx. 3 qt.) and set aside to keep warm.

Place potatoes, milk, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and cook 30 min/195°F//speed . Meanwhile preheat oven to 400°F.

Add butter to mixing bowl and blend 15 sec/speed 7.

Spread mashed potatoes over meat mixture, then crosshatch the top with a fork. Bake for 30 minutes (400°F) until browned and bubbling. Allow to rest 10 minutes before serving.

Ingredients

3 garlic cloves

8 oz yellow onions, cut into pieces

6 oz carrots, peeled, cut into pieces

5 oz celery, cut into pieces

6 oz tomatoes, quartered

2 oz red bell pepper, de-seeded, cut into pieces

2 sprigs fresh oregano, leaves only

½ oz extra virgin olive oil

20 oz ground beef, broken into pieces

1 tbsp tomato paste

½ tsp salt, to taste

35 oz potatoes, peeled, cut into pieces (1 in.)

8 oz whole milk

1 tsp salt

¼ tsp ground black pepper

4 oz unsalted butter

Nutrition

Calories: 1661 kJ / 397 kcal
Protein: 12 g
Carbohydrates: 24 g
Fat: 29 g
Cholesterol: 71 mg
Fiber: 4 g
